# Do not edit this file as it will be overwritten if HAMR codegen is rerun

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8.2)

project (TempControlSystem_Instance C)

add_definitions(-DCAMKES)

include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CMake_TranspilerOptions.cmake)

if ("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" MATCHES "(C|c?)lang")
  add_compile_options("$<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Oz>")
elseif ("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "GNU")
  add_compile_options(-fstack-usage)
  add_compile_options("$<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Os>")
endif()

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slang_libraries/TempSensor_tsp_tst)

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slang_libraries/TempControl_tcp_tct)

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slang_libraries/Fan_fp_ft)

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slang_libraries/SlangTypeLibrary)

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/types)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(TempSensor_tsp_tst
  SOURCES components/TempSensor_tsp_tst/src/sb_TempSensor.c types/src/sp_union_art_DataContent.c
  INCLUDES components/TempSensor_tsp_tst/includes/ types/includes types/includes
  LIBS TempSensor_tsp_tst
)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(TempControl_tcp_tct
  SOURCES components/TempControl_tcp_tct/src/sb_TempControl.c types/src/sp_union_art_DataContent.c types/src/sb_queue_union_art_DataContent_1.c types/src/sb_queue_union_art_DataContent_1.c
  INCLUDES components/TempControl_tcp_tct/includes/ types/includes types/includes
  LIBS TempControl_tcp_tct
)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(Fan_fp_ft
  SOURCES components/Fan_fp_ft/src/sb_Fan.c types/src/sb_queue_union_art_DataContent_1.c types/src/sb_queue_union_art_DataContent_1.c
  INCLUDES components/Fan_fp_ft/includes/ types/includes
  LIBS Fan_fp_ft
)

DeclareCAmkESRootserver(TempControlSystem_Instance.camkes)
